scripts.build:arkui-no-common:inc: npm run unmemoize && node ../../ui2abc/fast-arktsc --config ./arktsconfig-unmemoized.json --compiler ../../incremental/tools/panda/arkts/arktsc --link-name ./build/arkui-no-common.abc && ninja ${NINJA_OPTIONS} -f build/abc/build.ninja
scripts.build:arkui-no-common:inc:ui2abc: npm run annotate && node ../../ui2abc/fast-arktsc --config ./ui2abcconfig.json --compiler ../../incremental/tools/panda/arkts/ui2abc --link-name ./build-m3/arkui-no-common.abc --restart-stages && ninja ${NINJA_OPTIONS} -f build-m3/build.ninja -k 1200
scripts.build:arkui-no-common:inc:ui2abc:recheck: npm run annotate && node ../../ui2abc/fast-arktsc --config ./ui2abcconfig-recheck.json --compiler ../../incremental/tools/panda/arkts/ui2abc --link-name ./build-m3/arkui-no-common.abc && ninja ${NINJA_OPTIONS} -f build-m3-recheck/build.ninja -k 1200
